page.title: 05Health Drugs Alpha Droxford
page.content: Alpha House,Wickham Rd,0489 877478/210 A drug_free,residential ,therapeutic community for the rehabilitation of men and women aged 16_40 who have alcohol or drug_related problems.A hierarchical structure operates,in which residents undertake routine tasks running the house,garden and minor maintenance.They assume greater responsibility as they progress through the programme,run therapy groups using techniques such as psycho drama,encounter,gestalt etc.After about 1yr. in the main house residents move into other accomodation owned by Alpha House Ltd.and gradually re_enter the wider community taking on voluntary work,further education and or paid employment and eventually independent accomodation. Featured in "Drug Watch" July '85
